verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You are my everything. You are my all in all. You’re the song that I sing, the answer when I call. You are my everything. You are my all in all. It’s in You that my life is blessed, You are my righteousness, You are my all in all.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You are everything. You are my all in all. You’re the strength of my life. You lift me when I fall. You are my everything. You are my all in all. You’re my Father who cares for me, You have created me, You are my all in all.{/lang-eng}
